sentences.sContent: They are the rudder, keeping the ship going in the right direction.
sentences.sContent_eng: They are the rudder, keeping the ship going in the right direction.
sentences.sCn: 它们也犹如船舵，保证采访之船行驶在正确的方向上。

remMethod.val: 最前面的奔跑者(runner)是领导者(rudder)

trans.tranOther: a flat part at the back of a ship or aircraft that can be turned in order to control the direction in which it moves
